attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Department of Health and Defence to do assessments on (PTSD) Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Using the therapy model called FasterEFT and EFT.

This form of therapy as had a large impact throughout the World on many events. such as natural disasters and war victims.

I have worked personally with local G.P.'s who would like N.I.C.E. to allow research on the benefit of this simple yet proficient model of therapeutic change.
